version_description:
***New Update + New My Town : Preschool***
1. We Fixed the icons on the top screen
2. We Fixed some bugs in the game
3. Please rate our game 5 stars for more cool updates

The game you've waited for is here
My Town : Beach Picnic, Download today at a special price
Lots of activities, foods and beach fun

Police Update includes:
Ipad2 Stability Issue - FIXED
Police door not opening - FIXED
Updated SDK, game runs faster now!

***New Update + New My Town : Preschool***
1. We Fixed the icons on the top screen
2. We Fixed some bugs in the game
3. Please rate our game 5 stars for more cool updates

The game you've waited for is here
My Town : Beach Picnic, Download today at a special price
Lots of activities, foods and beach fun

Police Update includes:
Ipad2 Stability Issue - FIXED
Police door not opening - FIXED
Updated SDK, game runs faster now!

The update you have been waiting for!
1. Full sharing is here! Now you can hold the items using the characters and
move them between the games!
2. wow!!! now you can travel with your family between different games using the family car.
*** To activate the sharing and the map make sure to update HOME game First with the new version.
3. New Rooms and a lot more fun!

If you enjoy playing My Town, please leave us a review!
For any other issues, send us an email at info@my-town.com
